title: Digest of the Decisions of the Courts of Missouri
additional-note: Volumes of this law reporter were typically renewed as books, rather than as periodicals. Volume 22, published in 1929 is the last we have found any record of. A search of later years in the CCE and the registered works database did not turn up any further renewal recods associated with this title.  It may have been functionally replaced by Missouri Digest, which began in 1929.
